title: AI for SMEs: Practical Automation
description: A no-jargon seminar for small and medium businesses on using AI tools for marketing, support, and operations. Live demos + takeaway playbooks.

title: Personal Finance 101 for Gen Z
description: Budgeting, taxes, insurance, and investing basics—built for first-jobbers. Includes simple templates and Q&A.

title: Cloud Architecture Patterns
description: Learn microservices, event-driven design, caching, and cost control on AWS/GCP with real case studies from Indian startups.

title: Product Management Fundamentals
description: From user research to MVP to GTM—frameworks, metrics, and stakeholder communication with examples.

title: Digital Marketing Deep Dive
description: SEO in 2025, performance ads, and content that converts. Includes live audit of attendee pages.

title: UX Writing & Microcopy
description: Make apps clearer and friendlier. Learn error messages, empty states, and checkout copy with hands-on exercises.

title: Creative Writing for Content Creators
description: Story structure, hooks, and editing tactics to level-up your blogs, scripts, and newsletters.

title: Food Safety & FSSAI Compliance for Home Bakers
description: Licensing, labeling, hygiene, and packaging—everything you need to go legit as a home bakery.

title: Public Speaking Bootcamp (Crash Seminar)
description: Beat stage fear, structure talks, and deliver with confidence. On-stage practice with feedback.

title: Startup Legal Basics
description: Entity types, founders' agreements, ESOPs, and IP—what to know before fundraising.

title: Cricket Fast Bowling Workshop
description: Action analysis, run-up rhythm, and injury-free pace development. Limited nets with video feedback.

title: Marathon Training Seminar: 10K to Half
description: Periodization, pacing, nutrition, and tapering plans for your next city run.

title: Badminton Footwork & Stamina Workshop
description: On-court drills for explosiveness, recovery steps, and endurance routines.

title: Football Goalkeeping Clinic
description: Positioning, handling, and one-on-ones with licensed coaches. Includes reflex drills.

title: Sports Nutrition for Amateur Athletes
description: Macros, hydration, race-day fueling, and supplement safety with a certified dietitian.

title: Table Tennis Spin & Serve Workshop
description: Grip tweaks, multi-ball drills, and serve deception to level up club play.

title: Yoga for Runners: Mobility & Breath
description: Hips, hamstrings, and ankle mobility routines; breathwork for longer steady runs.

title: Basketball Shooting Mechanics Seminar
description: Form, release timing, and shot selection—video breakdowns of elite shooters.

title: Injury Prevention for Amateur Athletes
description: Warm-ups that work, strength basics, and recovery habits to stay consistent all season.

title: Ultimate Frisbee Skills Workshop
description: Throws, cuts, and zone defense essentials with scrimmage at the end.
